messages.messageBody:
yessssssssss finally I have the right title, and the right author's
name.....somehow gibson(of roman history)never left my mind,wonder
why?anyhow, thanks a million fellow ronins...........ever read any
of mishima's books on japanese events as the ronins?once more,
thanks for the tip, I will have some good reading for a while...
